overview: The movie Ei Ami Renu is mainly a story of the '80s, made in the context of the '80s. The story of the movie is reminiscent of the '80s. All the cultures of the '80s have been reflected in the movies. Ei Ami Renu's movie is based on the use of the old days the telephone, music, manners. Ei Ami Renu's story is based on the same novel, written by Samaresh Majumder.
title: Ei Ami Renu
